Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 5/3/1986, off Dennis Martinez (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1986, off Ron Guidry (CHC)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against San Diego on 10/1/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1986, hitting .563 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago on 5/23/1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,250,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,542,857 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,542,857 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis on 6/29/1990...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Detroit on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: 1B J.T. Snow, P Xavier Hernandez. Going to DET: 1B Ron Coomer, RF Bobby Bonilla)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1990, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
9/24/1990: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $6,250,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1990, hitting .365 with 9 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/1990, hitting .474 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
10/6/1990: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $6,250,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1991, hitting .376 with 9 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1992, hitting .529 with 7 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1992, hitting .356 with 13 HR, 23 RBI...
Injured on 3/5/1993 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
